description: Yummy whipped espresso coffee (a take on the original instant coffee recipe). Add ice for a cool summer treat.
name: Dalgona Made With Espresso Pods Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make the espresso as per the pod machine instructions.
Take two tablespoons of hot espresso and place into a mixing bowl with sugar. (You can use sugar of your choosing: white, brown etc.)

Use electric hand mixer (it's best to use a hand mixer for this) or stand mixer to whip the mixture until it is thick, aerated and forming soft peaks. **NOTE** It will not fluff up as much as instant coffee would.
Once dalgona ready spoon over milk and enjoy!
